long_description: These Thule Hydro-Glide kayak saddles provide a slick and easy way to load your kayak-and they fit on factory installed racks. Mounting hardware fits square, round and most factory-installed racks. Sold as a pair; 2 pairs are needed to carry one kayak. Includes a strap, buckle bumper and QuickDraw ratcheting bow/stern tie-down. Universal hardware makes carrier transfer between vehicles a snap. Accommodates kayaks up to 36 in. wide and 75 lbs.
short_description: These Thule Hydro-Glide kayak saddles provide a slick and easy way to load your kayak-and they fit on factory installed racks.
